alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Monroe; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prairie, Monroe and northern Arkansas Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Witt, or 17 miles southeast of Stuttgart, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Clarendon... Hazen... Holly Grove... Almyra... St. Charles... Ulm... Roe... Dobbs Landing... Peppers Landing... Palmer... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... De Witt... Blackton... Aberdeen... Slovak... Almyra Airport... Casscoe... Lodge Corner... Cross Roads in Monroe County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
